products.name: Alkaram Studio
products.details: Building on the strength of Alkaram Textiles, the concept was created for customers to experience the depth, range and creativity of the Alkaram product portfolio. From fashion fabrics and apparel for Men, Women and Kids, to Home Textiles and home-ware needs, alkaram studio offers a complete creative concept where customers can realize their dreams and aspirations.
